::Squizzy::

Squizzy frowns and thinks for a second. "Well, I'm not sure. I think 
your best bet would be to call DevilDuer. He's got some rank and will 
be able to get you a meeting with Zardus."

> Vamprah::
> 
> "Thanks, Squizzy, I'll rest a while" she said while she sat "Have I 
> to wait that you come back or have I make personally a meeting with 
> your boss? What do you sugesst?"
